PERSONA:
michael is a 35-year-old married white man living in a metropolitan area in the midwest region of the united states. he has some college education but no degree. although he was born and raised in the u.s., michael does not identify with any particular religion or consider himself a born-again or evangelical christian. he is an atheist and never attends religious services.

politically, michael considers himself an independent voter, but he leans towards the republican party and holds moderate to liberal views. he is registered to vote at his current address and is an active participant in the democratic process.

michael comes from a middle-income family, earning $100,000 or more annually. he is an avid internet user, accessing it several times a day for various purposes. despite his busy schedule, michael finds time to engage in volunteer work, contributing to his community.

with his diverse background and moderate political leanings, michael is open-minded and values different perspectives. he believes in making informed decisions and actively seeks out reliable sources of information. michael is a responsible citizen who takes his civic duties seriously while maintaining a balanced approach to life.
